clauses: Software developer with a passion for web development and data science.
Use my full potential for the advancement and innovation in the beautiful world of software engineering so as to design useful and efficient applications that will suit our end-users needs. .

timeline.title: Student Full-stack developer ~~ Shaire
tasks: Implementing & designing components for mobile app and in-app games
Integrating React web apps with API
timeline.description: Contributed to the growth of the company as a full-stack developer, contributing to the realization of client's web apps

timeline.title: Student developer ~~ ADVA
tasks: Developed and improved pipelines for Continuous Integration and Development.
Built and integrated a networking visualization library for simulation projects.
Migrated projects from Maven to Gradle to ease dependencies management.
Implementing unit tests to ensure good code coverage.

timeline.title: Code maintainer ~~ coala.io
tasks: Added support for 10+ linting tools to coala extending to support much more languages.
Unified configurations across more than 90% of the supported linting tools, thus improving consistency and ease of use.
Added support and documentation for aspect based code quality checking.
Reviewed pull requests and helped newcomers to get started with open source in the community.
timeline.description: Contributed to the extension of the open-source project coala.io, through the google summer of code program.

tasks: Designed the NGO web sharing plaform with Adobe XD.
Designed and implemented the database and REST API with Node.js and express.js.
Implemented the website with HTML / SASS / and javascript.
Added support for Oauth to facilitate the onboarding process.
timeline.title: Full-stack developer ~~ Jade cameroon
